meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sarah Woodring Ian Shin LaKedra Pam Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7652.

td.p: Sarah Woodring, a crafter from Sturgis, Kentucky
Ian Shin, a professor from Lewiston, Maine
LaKedra Pam, a physician from Baton Rouge, Louisiana (whose 1-day cash winnings total $24,801)

tr.td: HOLIDAY SONGS
ANAGRAMMED STATE CAPITALS
GOOD CAUSES
MAN MAKES THE CLOTHES
"DOUBLE" FEATURE
ROBERT SIEGEL SIGNS OFF
(Alex: The long-time host of NPR's All Things Considered is stepping down this January.)

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):

tr.td: LaKedra
Ian
Sarah

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: LaKedra
Ian
Sarah
MAMMAL PLANET
____ING ON POETRY
SCENES FROM AN ITALIAN RESTAURANT
"IM" THE LAW
EUROPEAN HISTORY
(Alex: Each correct response will be two words, five letters each.)
